template.name: Zabbix proxy health
template.description: Generated by official Zabbix template tool "Templator"

item.name: Discovery queue
item.description: The count of values enqueued in the discovery queue.

item.name: Preprocessing queue
item.description: The count of values enqueued in the preprocessing queue.

item.name: Utilization of agent poller data collector processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the agent poller processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of agent poller processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of agent poller processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"agent poller"}%

item.name: Utilization of availability manager internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the availability manager processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of availability manager processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of availability manager processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"availability manager"}%

item.name: Utilization of browser poller data collector processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the browser poller processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of browser poller processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of browser poller processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"browser poller"}%

item.name: Utilization of configuration syncer internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the configuration syncer processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of configuration syncer processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of configuration syncer processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"configuration syncer"}%

item.name: Utilization of data sender internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the data sender processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of data sender processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of data sender processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"data sender"}%

item.name: Utilization of discovery manager internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the discovery manager processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of discovery manager processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of discovery manager processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"discovery manager"}%

item.name: Utilization of discovery worker internal processes, in %

trigger.name: Utilization of discovery worker processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of discovery worker processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"discovery worker"}%

item.name: Utilization of history syncer internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the history syncer processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of history syncer processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of history syncer processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"history syncer"}%

item.name: Utilization of housekeeper internal processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the housekeeper processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of housekeeper processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of housekeeper processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"housekeeper"}%

item.name: Utilization of http agent poller data collector processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the http agent poller processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.expression: avg(/Zabbix proxy health/zabbix[process,http agent poller,avg,busy],10m)>{$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"http agent poller"}
trigger.recovery_expression: avg(/Zabbix proxy health/zabbix[process,http agent poller,avg,busy],10m)<{$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MIN:"http agent poller"}
trigger.name: Utilization of http agent poller processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of http agent poller processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"http agent poller"}%

item.name: Utilization of http poller data collector processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the http poller processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of http poller processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of http poller processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"http poller"}%

trigger.name: Utilization of poller processes is high

trigger.name: Utilization of preprocessing worker processes is high

item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the self-monitoring processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of self-monitoring processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of self-monitoring processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"self-monitoring"}%

item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the snmp poller processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of snmp poller processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of snmp poller processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"snmp poller"}%

trigger.name: Utilization of task manager processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of task manager processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"task manager"}%

item.name: Utilization of trapper data collector processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the trapper processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of trapper processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of trapper processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"trapper"}%

trigger.name: Utilization of unreachable poller processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of unreachable poller processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"unreachable poller"}%

item.name: Utilization of vmware collector data collector processes, in %
item.description: The average percentage of the time during which the vmware collector processes have been busy for the last minute.

trigger.name: Utilization of vmware collector processes is high
trigger.event_name: Utilization of vmware collector processes over {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"vmware collector"}%

item.name: Proxy memory buffer, % used
item.description: Statistics and availability of Zabbix proxy memory buffer usage statistics. Percentage of used proxy memory buffer. Proxy memory buffer is used to store the new historical data and upload from it without accessing database.

trigger.name: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"proxy buffer"}% used in the proxy memory buffer
trigger.description: Consider increasing ProxyMemoryBufferSize in the zabbix_proxy.conf configuration file.

item.name: Proxy buffer, state changes
item.description: The number of state changes between disk/memory buffer modes since proxy start.

item.name: Proxy buffer, state
Values waiting to be sent
item.description: Number of values in the proxy history table waiting to be sent to the server.

item.name: Queue over 10 minutes
item.description: The number of monitored items in the queue, which are delayed at least by 10 minutes.

trigger.name: More than 100 items having missing data for more than 10 minutes

item.name: Queue
item.description: The number of monitored items in the queue, which are delayed at least by 6 seconds.

item.name: Configuration cache, % used
item.description: The availability statistics of Zabbix configuration cache. The percentage of used data buffer.

trigger.name: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"configuration cache"}% used in the configuration cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `CacheSize` in the `zabbix_proxy.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Required VPS
item.description: The required performance of a proxy (the number of values that need to be collected per second).

item.name: Uptime
item.description: Uptime of Zabbix proxy process in seconds.

trigger.name: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted
trigger.event_name: {HOST.NAME} has been restarted (uptime < 10m) now()

item.name: Version
item.description: A version of Zabbix proxy.

trigger.expression: last(/Zabbix proxy health/zabbix[version],#1)<>last(/Zabbix proxy health/zabbix[version],#2) and length(last(/Zabbix proxy health/zabbix[version]))>0
trigger.name: Version has changed
trigger.event_name: Version has changed (new version: {ITEM.VALUE})
trigger.description: Zabbix proxy version has changed. Acknowledge to close the problem manually.

item.name: VMware cache, % used
item.description: The availability statistics of Zabbix vmware cache. The percentage of used data buffer.

trigger.name: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"vmware cache"}% used in the vmware cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `VMwareCacheSize` in the `zabbix_proxy.conf` configuration file.

item.name: History write cache, % used
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The percentage of used history buffer. The history cache is used to store item values. A high number indicates performance problems on the database side.

trigger.name: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"history cache"}% used in the history cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `HistoryCacheSize` in the `zabbix_proxy.conf` configuration file.

item.name: History index cache, % used
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The percentage of used history index buffer. The history index cache is used to index values stored in the history cache.

trigger.name: More than {$ZABBIX.PROXY.UTIL.MAX:"index cache"}% used in the history index cache
trigger.description: Consider increasing `HistoryIndexCacheSize` in the `zabbix_proxy.conf` configuration file.

item.name: Number of processed numeric (float) values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed numeric (float) values.

item.name: Number of processed log values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed log values.

item.name: Number of processed not supported values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of times the item processing resulted in an item becoming unsupported or keeping that state.

item.name: Number of processed character values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed character values.

item.name: Number of processed text values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed text values.

item.name: Number of processed numeric (unsigned) values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The number of processed numeric (unsigned) values.

item.name: Number of processed values per second
item.description: The statistics and availability of Zabbix write cache. The total number of values processed by Zabbix server or Zabbix proxy, except unsupported items.

macro.description: Default maximum threshold for percentage utilization triggers (use macro context for specification).
Default minimum threshold for percentage utilization triggers (use macro context for specification).
